title: Bug
body: It alweys says that I recconect but I finished my game and didnt join another one at all what do I do?

replies.body: It sounds like you're stuck in ghost game, which is when the match isn't communicating that it's ended to the server.  Normally, relogging can force it and get you out the reconnect screen.  Otherwise, it may take an hour to solve on its own.  Hopefully, everything is okay now!
